message.body: Beth is coming out tomorrow around 7 PM. Please leave your bedroom door unlocked. Thanks!
I told her I want her to come back Wednesday & Friday too.
You wouldn't happen to be at home would you?
So excited to have a working dryer again!
No :( closing at last drop
I'll be home within the hr though
OK. If you could check it when you get home I'd appreciate it. He is planning on coming tomorrow to deliver a new(ish) dryer.
Check ...the dryer?
The lockbox.
Really!!!!????
That seems antithetical to the point of the lock box! Haha doesn't that make so many more combos possible!?
...must call a math professor
I don't think I'm explaining it well. You can pick anywhere between 1 & all 10 numbers. But say you pick 5 numbers. 1,2,3,4,5. You can enter those 5 numbers in any order. 12345 54321 43215 23541 etc.
Oh no, I understood
I just never knew lock boxes allowed that
I have always wondered how how easy it would be to pick. Not sure of the probabilities.
Are you sure?
Most other lockboxs work differently.
Yup. I did real estate for like almost 20 years. That was the most common type of lockbox. I must have opened that type like literally thousands of times
I would like to ask a mathematician what the probability of figuring out the right code.
Oh right duh lol if anyone would know lock boxes, it is a real estate guy
Yeah. It might have been tens of thousands. It's a funny business in a place like U City. You get to see how not just the other half lives but sort of how both halves live.
